cfdna.cfDNA_summary¶

class cfdna.cfDNA_summary(data=None, bin_size=100000, genome='hg19', bin_bias_h5_fn=None, outlier_smooth=True, gauss_smooth=False, n_threads=1, tss_fn='hg19_TSS.bed', normal=[0.1, 0.5, 0.9], ploidy=[2], estimatePloidy=False, minSegmentBins=25, maxCN=7, bcp_cutoff=0.3, directory='./', verbose=False)[source]¶

Contains cfDNA summary results

Attributes

bins

pandas.DataFrame of chromosome bins

chrom_shift

dictionary of chromosome shifts (for plotting)

genome

dictionary of chromosome lengths (for plotting)

hmm_loglik

pandas.DataFrame of hmm results for hmmCNV

median_var

int of median segment variance

segments_df

pandas.DataFrame of CNV segments

Methods

write(output_h5)

Write cfDNA_summary object

write_seg_file(out_fn[, sample])

Write segmentation file
